name: Euclid.Rectangle

aliases.name: Rectangle
aliases.comment: A polymorphic rectangle defined by its top left corner and its size
aliases.type: { corner : Euclid.Vector.Vector n, size : Euclid.Vector.Vector n }

values.name: opposite
values.comment: Opposite corner of a rectangle (bottom right)

name: Euclid.Vector

values.name: add
values.type: Euclid.Vector.Vector number -> Euclid.Vector.Vector number -> Euclid.Vector.Vector number

values.name: dotwise
values.comment: Apply some function to two vectors component-wise (like map for two vectors)
values.type: (a -> a -> b) -> Euclid.Vector.Vector a -> Euclid.Vector.Vector a -> Euclid.Vector.Vector b

values.name: fold
values.comment: Reduce a Vector to a single value by applying some function to its components

values.name: map
values.comment: Apply some function to each component

values.name: map2
values.type: (a -> a -> b) -> Euclid.Vector.Vector a -> Euclid.Vector.Vector a -> Euclid.Vector.Vector b

values.name: subtract
values.type: Euclid.Vector.Vector number -> Euclid.Vector.Vector number -> Euclid.Vector.Vector number

values.name: vec
values.comment: Construct a vector from an X and a Y value
